definition: expressive of or exciting sexual love or romance, a soulful or amorous idealist
details:
adjective
- expressive of or exciting sexual love or romance
= synonyms: amorous
- not sensible about practical matters
= synonyms: wild-eyed
- belonging to or characteristic of Romanticism or the Romantic Movement in the arts
= example: belonging to or characteristic of Romanticism or the Romantic Movement in the arts
= synonyms: romanticistic
noun
- a soulful or amorous idealist
- an artist of the Romantic Movement or someone influenced by Romanticism
= synonyms: romanticist
